title: kindred
body: why did riot make kindred such a useless champion now? Some may have argued that kindred was an overpowered champ on release but that shouldn't mean to nerf her into the ground making her unplayed in all regions and not even fun now. Riot has made kindred useless and i am pissed.

I am annoyed that they kept going on about kindred being a high skill champ when to use that as an excuse to nerf mechanics that were actually quite simple. And kept nerfing the damage for functioning as a champ who's late relied directly on their early.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadow Hazard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h8gLzswE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-26T23:54:55.343+0000)

> I am annoyed that they kept going on about kindred being a high skill champ when to use that as an excuse to nerf mechanics that were actually quite simple. And kept nerfing the damage for functioning as a champ who's late relied directly on their early.

They have a high skill cap for a great many reasons. Mechanically, they're fairly simple. But they have Lamb's Respite, which is a very tricky spell to utilize properly, and they also have to know when and where and how to get around the jungle. There's a lot of macro level decision making required to play them effectively.

The problem with their late relying on their early is that if you give them an unbeatable early (which they had before) then they WILL hit their late game, full power, and be an early game monster, and you just flat out lose. Kindred mains and people in Plat+ were banning them like 80% of the time because of how ridiculously broken they were before all the nerfs. You could out-duel anyone at level 3.

Kindred main Mastery 7 here. 

Honestly, I started playing them about a month and half ago way after those nerfs. I can kill and carry just fine it's a bit hard ultra late game, but early and mid game they are really good. The CD on their ult is a bit much, but other than that they are fine. The only thing that bothers me is their W will not attack enemies that go into a bush or behind a bush where their is no vision even when you has lamb run through the bush and continue attacking wolf just sits there and does nothing. You can easily do this  bug with the scuttle crab when it's making it's way behind that little bush in the river.

The new jungle isn't too bad for her just takes a bit more kiting.
